summary: Email correspondence among members of the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force discussing flight records of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, and attempts to contact individuals (including Epstein's brothers) for interviews. The email includes specific flight details from August 1994.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as a passenger on flights detailed in the records being discussed, specifically a flight from Aspen to Michigan and then to Palm Beach in August 1994.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as a passenger alongside Epstein on a flight from Michigan to Palm Beach on August 20, 1994.

connections.description: Both listed as passengers on the same flight from TVC to PBI on August 20, 1994.

events.title: Flight from Aspen to Michigan
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein flew from Aspen, Colorado (ASE) to Grand Traverse County, Michigan (TVC). TVC airport is noted as a 23-minute drive to Interlochen.

events.title: Flight from Michigan to Palm Beach
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell flew from Grand Traverse County, Michigan (TVC) to Palm Beach, Florida (PBI).

events.title: Task Force Investigation Activities
events.description: NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force members are reviewing flight records (1991-2006) provided by counsel and attempting to contact individuals, including Epstein's brothers, for interviews.

keyFacts: Flight records for Jeffrey Epstein covering 1991-2006 were provided to the NYPD/FBI Task Force by counsel in January 2020.
A specific flight on August 18, 1994, shows Epstein flying from Aspen, CO, to an airport near Interlochen, MI.
A flight on August 20, 1994, shows Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell traveling together from Michigan to Palm Beach, FL.
The task force was actively attempting to contact Epstein's brothers for interviews as part of their investigation.
The document indicates ongoing investigative efforts by a joint NYPD/FBI task force into child exploitation and human trafficking related to Epstein.
